bow: things we do when we re sleep deprived was holding my almost month old son in one hand and bottle in the other hand while walked into the kitchen to put the bottle into the sink put my baby into the sink instead stood there for second just holding him there in the sink before realizing that something did seem right lol if you have any stories of the silly things you ve done while being sleep deprived please share had my baby in his car seat clipped to the stroller coming out of store unlatched his buckle removed him from the car seat opened the car door and realized that needed him in the car seat had just removed him from ugh that hilarious and sounds about right hope you get some sleep did lots of things like this all the time would put the remote to tv in freezer and raw meat in cupboards had stuff everywhere mom my would come over and say why is this in here lol after my third kid was born brushed my teeth with diaper rash cream took full 10 seconds or so because realized why my mouth tasted weird at weeks pp my husband had to be gone 16 hours day for work and school so was doing solo days and nights with twins sleep deprived is an understatement he came home from work one night and gave him hug and instinctively started burping his back while doing it 🤦‍♀️ got up to change my daughter diaper on the middle of the night and put the clean diaper right on over the wet one took me surprisingly long time to figure what did seem right those newborn weeks are *something* hahah just laughed out loud to this once when was changing my son diaper took off the dirty one but forgot to put on new one he wet his pants and we had house full of guests for thanksgiving mostly just lots of lying on the floor or couch just to rest my eyes no do need nap zzzzzzzz typically reheat leftovers in the toaster oven for lunch but the other day my sister in law sent me home with tupperware of chili for the next day which put in the toaster oven to reheat instead of the microwave sometimes would wake up in the middle of the night and go start rocking my daughter only to realize that she had never woken up in the first place poured my coffe into my cereal tried to be positive that it might be delicious but ruined them both it more rather what didn do in bed when the baby starts crying at 2am get up do the change reswaddle the baby back in the bassinet he goes throw out the diaper wash my hands and just get back in bed when realize ve never left the baby is still crying that was real just dreamt going through the motions and had to get up and go change the baby again double changes were exhausting removed better than the time took my week old out of the carseat in the stroller in the store then put him back and *forgot to buckle him in realized after driving halfway across town and pulled over and ugly sobbed used baby formula instead of creamer in my coffee extra vitamins and protein removed once grabbed my husband head and pulled it to my chest in an attempt to breastfeed him in the middle of the night🤦 had heard baby fuss from his crib and got confused scared the crap out of my husband this cracked me up that stuff is hard to get off without wipes how did you manage it just did this last week with my week old the guilt my son is months old and recently happened to be upstairs while my husband was doing the bath it was until he was doing the sleeper up that said umm and he said something had seemed wrong we absolutely would have had that situation desperately tried to unlock my front door with my car fob was almost to the point of tears when suddenly just said oh wait duh always bouncing whether holding baby or not note have one year old and still do this been there xo lol omg thank you for sharing definitely done that at least once hahah glad not the only one realized the other day that always bouncing and swaying when standing up now baby or not removed think it was only week two that my partner took the diaper pail out and tried to put it in the mailbox used to make myself cup of tea and make scrambled eggs in separate mug every morning when my daughter was just starting solids one morning put my tea bag in my tea mug and then cracked an egg right on top of it did this she crawled into the front seat with me scared me shitless we were on highway she was about put formula powder in my coffee maker you know you need coffee when ve still got this going on and she gon na be in october not me but my husband when our second baby was about weeks old he managed to lock us out of the master bedroom phone charger car keys both of our wallets were all in there for an entire day and it was holiday thanksgiving until locksmith was available thank goodness the diaper bag was in the room because baby would have had papertowel duct tape diaper think my twins were months old at the time middle of the night baby is fussing so put him to breast all finished and move to pick him up to put him back in the cosleeper except can pick him up start internally freaking out how much did just breastfeed this guy he weighs at least 50 pounds what just happened start coming to and realize it was all dream and in all actuality was trying to pick up my 50 pound year old babies were sound asleep my husband would have been scarred for life asked my mom if had pooped that day she lives hours away and wasn able to help was trying to figure out if had taken enough colace when my twins were about months old 12 years old now my husband was sitting in our recliner chair with baby on his lap they were just chilling out he had rubber band from newspaper in his hand fiddling with it baby was just sitting there we were chatting away with one another and for some reason he took that rubber band and made triangle on her arm with it and snapped it back causing the band to sting her arm what the ever loving amp did he just do we just stared at one another and then obviously she started wailing he quickly gets up hands her to me and exclaims why did just do that what is the wrong with me it still one of her favorite stories for me to tell he gets so embarrassed take care of my daughter who is 11 weeks old and my niece who is 10 weeks old during the day when not working there are some nights wake up in the middle of the night to feed my daughter and search frantically for my niece only to finally realize that at home in my bed and that my niece is at home with my brother ll even look under blankets sometimes before realizing its quite comical and embarrassing in one luckily now mine are and and if they even think getting in without buckling them they scream at me like its drop zone rollercoaster ride about to start ha she is very verbal about it too she ll be in october my clip ohh god mommy do my clipppppppp oh my gosh just posted about doing this my husband never left the tube of diaper cream in the bathroom again it was so disgusting week or so ago noticed carton of eggs had completely vanished from my fridge and couldn figure out where they went today look in the freezer and see the carton of said eggs in the freezer few hours later was making my son bottle and went into the living room and start shaking the bottle and have confused look on my face and make eye contact with my husband and he like no water huh on one of the nighttime diaper changes for my son at one month old only did one side of the diaper when changed him again in the morning was so confused why it was sideways around his waist this reminds me of the other day when panicked while we were driving down the road that had left our one month old at home on the bed in the one that put him in his car seat and the one that put him in the car 🤦‍♀️ would continue to rock my son rocker with my foot even though he was holding him or he was in his crib my best friend helped me out quite lot when my son was born and you know how you get into the habit of constantly swaying when you re standing up to sooth the baby she ended up rocking loaf of bread she was holding totally still do the swaying thing without realizing it to this day even though my son is three now when pregnant left bag of salad on the pantry cupboard found it dried and crispy the next week ve done that with getting up and getting dressed many times it very disorienting to wake up still in bed mine is eight and still do this it hard wired into the brain now all it two in the morning and laying here crying laughing so hard thanks for this best thread ever just ugly laughed have coworker who sways when she sita in certain way pretty sure it for the same reason she 60 btw up for the nighttime feeding now and just changed my daughters diaper with the same diaper my husband was trying to find his portable speaker to listen to music he searched all over the house and couldn find it an hour later go to the fridge to grab snack and lo and behold there it was when go shopping in the grocery store alone and use cart instead of pushing around stroller find myself pushing the cart back and forth lightly know to calm down the groceries oh do the dumbest stuff when im too tired like ll run to the store by myself and then as im pulling my card out of the chip reader turn to my cart and say okay let go buddy also just yesterday said beep beep to complete stranger in the grocery store so she get out of my way hey caring mother makes good caring wife you just wanted to make sure his gasses would stay inside yakno so we cosleep and when baby is waking up or stirring from gas she will move against my nipples and ll dream that breastfeeding her we ca breastfeeding laying down and only bf part time and have to offer pumped milk at every feed but she will actually wake up and ll dig there dazed trying to figure out if ve fed her already for good minute or two it great did this to my husband in the middle of the night when my twins were about one month old same started to sway holding bottle of soda at the store the first time left my lo alone with his dad my bff noticed and reminded me could stop yup could figure out why the baby would stop crying and just latch baby was still in the other room forgot to pull the bedrail up and my baby fell off the bed when she woke up poor baby she was fine but we both got scare think just scrubbed my mouth with washcloth bought new toothbrush though no saving that once tried to shake the empty pram to make the baby sleep which was on my husband the other time put the new diaper on inside out in the middle of the night it doesn hold pee well that way definitely did that few times middle of the 4th month sleep regression we re down in italy at my parents house baby wakes every hour at home she in chicco next to me at my parents it sort of pack amp play crib which doubles my fatigue putting her back down to sleep after nursing her each time invert where her head stays on the mattress because she only nurses one side at time and ai flipping her no time for that anyway one time pick her up under her armpits as usually do she makes her little ah oh little sound she uses to pinpoint any interaction with me and try to put her on the pillow to nurse say try because her mouth is not where it supposed to be and is trying to latch to my mommy rolls on the other side turns out those were her armpits she just went froggy legged and my exhausted self picked her up upside down in the dark lovingly trying to latch her legs to my boob my husband laughed so hard when told him he woke the baby again rinse and repeat you know how you bounce or rock your little bundle of joy whenever you hold them had just sat down from putting the baby to bed and instinctively started rocking back and forth my sister told me looked like crazy person and if had just started giggling she would have called the men in white coats been there also ugly cried woke up one night to the baby crying about weeks old get up to pick her up as sat back down on the bed see my husband sitting bolt upright rocking and soothing muslin burp cloth he was sound asleep still makes me laugh after loading up my daughter from stroller into the carseat left the stroller in the middle of very busy street downtown went back an hour later and it was moved to thre side of the street but still there also lost my car went on lunch every day to breastfeed my daughter who would take bottle and it was snowing one day so drove about mile then forgot drove and walked back to work hours later panicking in the parking garage while it super snowy outside trying to find my car finally walked to the daycare to see if it was there it was with tickets just snort laughed my coffee over this ve done this countless times the really weird thing is that the opposite is now happening since he starting to sleep longer woke up this morning and thought oh crap he slept through the night and his diaper is probably soaked and never got up and changed him and terrible but had changed him woke up and changed and fed him around 3am and for minute when woke up this morning completely forgot that done that sleep deprivation is super weird and adjusting back from it is also super weird have two whoopsies one is from my gramma and the other is something did last week long time ago not necessarily in galaxy far far away my gramma was up with my uncle she had just fed him and was trying to get him to go back to sleep but he was having fit and she couldn figure out why he wasn settling down then it dawned on her that she was holding him upside down mine is pretty short started brushing my teeth with deodorant lol did this last week except instead of diaper rash cream it was deodorant lol yep done that too washed my face with toothpaste it burned in my defense the face wash bottle had similar shape accidentally got bit of deodorant in my mouth years ago got it on my finger proceeded to bite my nails and the sensation was absolutely terrible it was just tiny amount on the tip of my tongue but it shriveled up and was bitter ca imagine getting it all over my mouth like that put things where they are supposed to go even when have enough sleep frequently almost put the box of cereal in the fridge and the milk in the cupboard this one is my favorite this is making me tear up for some reason they ll always be our babies don recommend it lmao heard the baby cry last night and woke up from deep sleep and cuddled her back to sleep only my baby was in her bassinet and my cat was the one who cried out and while subsequently rocked back to sleep finally not doing this one so much but since we had our son ve been waking up frantically in the middle of the night looking for the baby because always swear fell asleep holding him every time look over and he sleeping in the bassinet and feel silly my child yells oh god too and it so embarrassing wondered where he learned it and then one day he made mess and heard my husband go oh god why and figured it out lol when my first was about week old got on the scale to weigh myself weighed myself several times thinking there no way gained like lbs then realized it was because was holding the baby mine say jesus christ all the time always just used the car seat part of my travel system for the school run attached it to the frame and off we went once he was awake so just got him out of the car seat and carried him to the school then came back strapped him in and drove off but where wasn used to strapping him in just strapping the car seat in had mind fart and just drove off without strapping the seat in like knew strapped something in so job done didn notice till got home and freaked out omg my 5yo does all the time and realized really need to stop saying that username checks out rocked stuffed animal instead of my baby when he started crying gave it head kisses and all also binge watched outdaughtered tlc show about family with quadruplet girls twice woke up wondering where the other babies were my husband did one like that once the baby starts crying so he gets up and does the whole unswaddle diaper change re swaddle rock the baby back to sleep but he forgot to feed him so guess who was awake again half an hour later lol tried to charge my sandwich instead of my phone yesterday remember almost doing that never want to know what desitan tastes like all the time shhhh almond milk pretzels eggs apples shhhhh etc this one made me cry laugh oh my gosh hope we live in the same neighborhood and run into you one day at the grocery store tv7 3w post partum and decided to do load of baby wash set the washer put in my detergent and turn it on nothing it wo fill tried everything unplugged the washer checked the water line canceled and restarted the program finally exhausted and frustrated gave up when woke up my hubs to swap baby duties mentioned to him that the washer would fill and could figure it out he later told me it was because was looking at the wrong side of the dial had turned it to what thought was normal wash cycle but the pointer end was actually on rinse and spin although in my defense hubs was also baffled for fair while before figuring it out now have trouble making sure my bra is on right or my camisole straps are over both shoulders my tired brain is so focused on pumping that it forgetting to remember clothing isn optional at work the other morning made myself cup of coffee but instead of putting the coffee grounds in the basket put them directly into the cup and hit the brew button and walked away imagine my surprise when picked it up and took nice swig ve tried to put my pajama pants on my kid instead of his got them halfway on before realized they were too long ve rocked myself back and forth before realizing there was no baby in my arms put three roman lettuce stalks in the freezer 🤷🏼‍♀️ just this morning put chocolate syrup in my coffee that was supposed to be for my toddlers milk 🤣🤣🤣 this was one of my sleep deprived habits too that and putting my phone in the fridge instead of the bottle in my other hand this still happens to me😭 woke my baby up laughing at this my aunt tried to change her husband diaper when my cousins were young he woke up with her trying to put his legs in the air omg that even better 😂😂😂 haha thank you was giggling when wrote it out ❤️ ve heard the story since was kid but it just got so much better when became mom 🤣🤣 sleep deprivation is real oh no that could have been good last weekend woke up got my baby fed him burped diaper and swaddled him and back to bed except did dreamed it and woke up to him still crying because it never happened pretty sure we had an amazon box at our door nearly every day doing mid night nurse and prime friends
